Title: Relates to requiring providers to share electronic medical records with healthcare plans
Summary: Requires that a contract between an insurer and a hospital shall include a provision that provides for medical records requested by the insurer or its utilization review agent to be made available electronically by the hospital; limits the use of disclosed records.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to requiring providers to share electronic medical records with healthcare plans
